item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> of the <st data-num="06879" class="">diseased person</st> on the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of his <st data-num="02893" class="">purification</st>, when<n id="1" /> he is <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="03318" class="">go</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the infection.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> of the <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased person</st> has been <st data-num="07495" class="">healed</st>,<n id="2" />

then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> that <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">birds</st>, a piece of <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, a scrap of <st data-num="08144" class="">crimson</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">fabric</st>,<n id="1" /> and some twigs of <st data-num="0231" class="">hyssop</st><n id="2" /> be <st data-num="03947" class="">taken up</st><n id="3" /> for the one being <st data-num="02891" class="">cleansed</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> that <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> be <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="02789" class="">clay</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>.<n id="2" />

Then<n id="1" /> he is to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> <st data-num="0854">along with</st> the piece of <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, the scrap of <st data-num="08144" class="">crimson</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">fabric</st>, and the twigs of <st data-num="0231" class="">hyssop</st>, and he is to <st data-num="02881" class="">dip</st> them and the <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> in the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>,
and sprinkle it seven times on the one being cleansed from the disease, pronounce him clean, and send the live bird away over the open countryside.
“The one being cleansed must then wash his clothes, shave off all his hair, and bathe in water, and so be clean. Then afterward he may enter the camp, but he must live outside his tent seven days.
When the seventh day comes, he must shave all his hair—his head, his beard, his eyebrows, all his hair—and he must wash his clothes, bathe his body in water, and so be clean.

“On the eighth day he must take two flawless male lambs, one flawless yearling female lamb, three-tenths of an ephah of choice wheat flour as a grain offering mixed with olive oil, and one log of olive oil,
and the priest who pronounces him clean will have the man who is being cleansed stand along with these offerings before the Lord at the entrance of the Meeting Tent.
“The priest is to take one male lamb and present it for a guilt offering along with the log of olive oil and present them as a wave offering before the Lord.

He must then <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> in the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st><n id="3" /> and the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st><n id="4" /> are <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st>,<n id="5" /> in the <st data-num="04725 06944">sanctuary</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st>, like the <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st>, the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st> belongs to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest;</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st>.

Then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="08571 0241">earlobe</st> of the one being <st data-num="02891" class="">cleansed</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">thumb</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">big toe</st><n id="2" /> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of the <st data-num="03849" class="">log</st> of <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> and <st data-num="03332" class="">pour</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">into</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">his</st> own <st data-num="08042" class="">left</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st>.<n id="1" />
Then the priest is to dip his right forefinger into the olive oil that is in his left hand, and sprinkle some of the olive oil with his finger seven times before the Lord.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> some of the <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="08571 0241">earlobe</st> of the one being <st data-num="02891" class="">cleansed</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">thumb</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">big toe</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st>,
and the remainder of the olive oil that is in his hand the priest is to put on the head of the one being cleansed. So the priest is to make atonement for him before the Lord.
“The priest must then perform the sin offering and make atonement for the one being cleansed from his impurity. After that he is to slaughter the burnt offering,
and the priest is to offer the burnt offering and the grain offering on the altar. So the priest is to make atonement for him and he will be clean.

“If the person is poor and does not have sufficient means, he must take one male lamb as a guilt offering for a wave offering to make atonement for himself, one-tenth of an ephah of choice wheat flour mixed with olive oil for a grain offering, a log of olive oil,
and two turtledoves or two young pigeons, which are within his means. One will be a sin offering and the other a burnt offering.
“On the eighth day he must bring them for his purification to the priest at the entrance of the Meeting Tent before the Lord,
and the priest is to take the male lamb of the guilt offering and the log of olive oil and wave them as a wave offering before the Lord.

Then he is to <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> of the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st>, and the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="08571 0241">earlobe</st> of the one being <st data-num="02891" class="">cleansed</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">thumb</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">big toe</st><n id="2" /> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="03332" class="">pour</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">into</st> <st data-num="03548">his</st> own <st data-num="08042" class="">left</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st>,<n id="1" />
and sprinkle some of the olive oil that is in his left hand with his right forefinger seven times before the Lord.

Then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">some of</st> the <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="08571 0241">earlobe</st> of the one being <st data-num="02891" class="">cleansed</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">thumb</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">big toe</st> of his <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> of the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st>,
and the remainder of the olive oil that is in the hand of the priest he is to put on the head of the one being cleansed to make atonement for him before the Lord.
“He will then make one of the turtledoves or young pigeons, which are within his means,
a sin offering and the other a burnt offering along with the grain offering. So the priest is to make atonement for the one being cleansed before the Lord.
This is the law of the one in whom there is a diseased infection, who does not have sufficient means for his purification.”
The Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am about to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="1" /> to you for a <st data-num="0272" class="">possession</st>, and I <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> you are to <st data-num="0272" class="">possess</st>,<n id="3" />

then <st data-num="0834" class="">whoever</st> owns the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">declare</st> to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, ‘Something like an <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> is <st data-num="07200" class="">visible</st> to me in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.’

Then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> that the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> be <st data-num="06437" class="">cleared</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02962" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">enters</st> to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st><n id="2" /> so that <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st><n id="3" /> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>,<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="0310 03651">afterward</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

He is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in the <st data-num="07023" class="">walls</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> consists of <st data-num="03422" class="">yellowish green</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0125" class="">reddish</st> <st data-num="08258" class="">eruptions</st>,<n id="2" /> and it <st data-num="04758" class="">appears</st> to be <st data-num="08217" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the surface of the <st data-num="07023" class="">wall</st>,<n id="3" />

then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">doorway</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> in the <st data-num="07023" class="">walls</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>,

then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> that the <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in them be <st data-num="02502" class="">pulled</st> and <st data-num="07993" class="">thrown</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> an <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.

Then they shall <st data-num="07106" class="">scrape</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> on the <st data-num="01004" class="">inside</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="06083" class="">plaster</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> they have <st data-num="07096" class="">scraped off</st><n id="4" /> must be <st data-num="08210" class="">dumped</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> an <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.
They are then to take other stones and replace those stones, and he is to take other plaster and replaster the house.
“If the infection returns and breaks out in the house after he has pulled out the stones, scraped the house, and it is replastered,

the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="03992" class="">malignant</st> <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>.

He must <st data-num="05422" class="">tear down</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>,<n id="1" /> its <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, its <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06083" class="">plaster</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> all of it<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> an <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.

Anyone who <st data-num="0935" class="">enters</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> the priest<n id="2" /> has <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantined</st> it will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.
Anyone who lies down in the house must wash his clothes. Anyone who eats in the house must wash his clothes.

“If, however, the priest enters and examines it, and the infection has not spread in the house after the house has been replastered, then the priest is to pronounce the house clean because the infection has been healed.

Then he<n id="1" /> is to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">birds</st>, a piece of <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, a scrap of <st data-num="08144" class="">crimson</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">fabric</st>, and some twigs of <st data-num="0231" class="">hyssop</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="02398" class="">purify</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>,

and he is to <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="02789" class="">clay</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>.<n id="1" />

He must then <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> the piece of <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, the twigs of <st data-num="0231" class="">hyssop</st>, the scrap of <st data-num="08144" class="">crimson</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">fabric</st>, and the <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st>, and <st data-num="02881" class="">dip</st> them in the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st> and in the <st data-num="02416" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="05137" class="">sprinkle</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">times</st>.

So he is to <st data-num="02398" class="">purify</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> with the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st>, the <st data-num="02416" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, the <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="06833" class="">bird</st>, the piece of <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, the twigs of <st data-num="0231" class="">hyssop</st>, and the scrap of <st data-num="08144" class="">crimson</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">fabric</st>,
and he is to send the live bird away outside the city into the open countryside. So he is to make atonement for the house, and it will be clean.
“This is the law for all diseased infections, for scall,
for the <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st>,<n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>,<n id="2" />
for the <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st>,<n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="05597" class="">scab</st>,<n id="2" /> and for the <st data-num="0934" class="">bright spot</st>,<n id="3" />
to teach when something is unclean and when it is clean. This is the law for dealing with infectious disease.”
